data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Eugenio Abbattista signals a throw-in for Udinese, close to Sassuolo's area.
In the minute 3, Goal kick for Sassuolo at Mapei Stadium.
Free kick for Sassuolo in their own half.
Sassuolo to take a throw-in in Udinese territory.
In the minute 5, Udinese awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Sassuolo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Sassuolo.
In the minute 8, Eugenio Abbattista signals a free kick to Udinese in their own half.
Throw-in for Udinese at Mapei Stadium.
Throw-in for Udinese close to the penalty box.
In the minute 9, Eugenio Abbattista signals a free kick to Sassuolo in their own half.
At Mapei Stadium, Ignacio Pussetto has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In Reggio Emilia a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 12, Udinese awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Reggio Emilia Sassuolo's Francesco Caputo is caught offside.
Throw-in for Sassuolo in the half of Udinese.
In the minute 15, Eugenio Abbattista signals a free kick to Udinese.
Free kick for Sassuolo in the half of Udinese.
Udinese's Bram Nuytinck has been booked in Reggio Emilia.
In the minute 17, Gian Marco Ferrari (Sassuolo) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Reggio Emilia.
Udinese have been awarded a corner by Eugenio Abbattista.
In the minute 18, Throw-in high up the field for Udinese in Reggio Emilia.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Sassuolo in their own half.
In the minute 22, Eugenio Abbattista signals a Udinese throw-in in Sassuolo's half.
In Reggio Emilia a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in Udinese.
In the minute 25, Can Sassuolo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Udinese's half?
Throw-in for Udinese in their own half.
In Reggio Emilia, Rodrigo De Paul of Udinese is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 31, Corner awarded to Udinese.
Eugenio Abbattista signals a free kick to Udinese.
Hamed Junior Traore for Sassuolo has been booked by Eugenio Abbattista and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 33, Eugenio Abbattista waits before resuming play because Tolgay Arslan for Udinese is still down.
Udinese awarded a free kick in their own half.
Tolgay Arslan for Udinese is back on the field again.
In the minute 37, Eugenio Abbattista signals a free kick to Sassuolo in their own half.
Domenico Berardi for Sassuolo drives towards goal at Mapei Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Sassuolo's Gian Marco Ferrari misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 39, Ball goes out of play for a Udinese goal kick.
Udinese awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Udinese.
In the minute 42, Samir of Udinese is pulled up for offside.
Free kick for Sassuolo in their own half.
Gian Marco Ferrari (Sassuolo) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 44, Play has been interrupted briefly in Reggio Emilia to check on Rodrigo De Paul, who is grimacing with pain.
Rodrigo De Paul is back on the pitch.
The 1st half is prolonged by 1 minutes of added time.
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
In the minute 46, Throw-in for Udinese in the half of Sassuolo.
Mert Muldur is replacing Hamed Junior Traore for the home team.
Eugenio Abbattista awards the home team a throw-in.
Udinese's Stefano Okaka is whistled for offside at Mapei Stadium.
In the minute 49, Udinese have been awarded a corner by Eugenio Abbattista.
Rodrigo De Paul is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Udinese have a goal kick.
In the minute 52, Sassuolo to take a throw-in in Udinese territory.
Udineseâ€™s Rodrigo De Paul is on his feet again at Mapei Stadium.
Udinese awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Udinese in their own half.
In the minute 54, The match at Mapei Stadium has been interrupted briefly for a check on Tolgay Arslan, who is down injured.
Sassuolo have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 56, Eugenio Abbattista awards Udinese a goal kick.
Tolgay Arslan has recovered and rejoins the match in Reggio Emilia.
Corner awarded to Udinese.
In the minute 58, Corner awarded to Udinese.
Sassuolo have been awarded a corner by Eugenio Abbattista.
Can Udinese capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sassuolo's half?
In the minute 61, Sassuolo needs to be cautious. Udinese have an attacking throw-in.
At Mapei Stadium, Udinese are penalized for being offside.
Eugenio Abbattista signals a free kick to Udinese in their own half.
In the minute 64, Gregoire Defrel is on a sub for Jeremie Boga for Sassuolo.
Free kick for Udinese in the half of Sassuolo.
Gerard Deulofeu is replacing Ignacio Pussetto for Udinese at Mapei Stadium.
In the minute 66, Can Udinese get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sassuolo's half?
Udinese have been awarded a corner by Eugenio Abbattista.
Sassuolo have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 69, In Reggio Emilia, Udinese push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Throw-in for Sassuolo close to the penalty box.
Corner awarded to Sassuolo.
In the minute 74, Corner awarded to Sassuolo.
Eugenio Abbattista signals a throw-in for Sassuolo, close to Udinese's area.
In Reggio Emilia a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 77, Ball goes out of play for a Udinese goal kick.
The home team have replaced Francesco Caputo with Giacomo Raspadori. This is the third substitution made today by Roberto De Zerbi.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 78, Can Udinese capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sassuolo's half?
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Udinese close to the penalty box.
Throw-in Udinese.
In the minute 83, Eugenio Abbattista signals a Udinese throw-in in Sassuolo's half.
Sassuolo needs to be cautious. Udinese have an attacking throw-in.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Reggio Emilia.
In the minute 85, Luca Gotti (Udinese) is making a second substitution, with Kevin Lasagna replacing Stefano Okaka.
Free kick for Sassuolo in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Sassuolo in Reggio Emilia.
In the minute 87, Mert Muldur is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Mert Muldur returns to the field for Sassuolo after picking up a slight injury.
Free kick Sassuolo.
Throw-in for Sassuolo close to the penalty box.
Sassuolo to take a throw-in in Udinese territory.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Udinese awarded a free kick in their own half.
Eugenio Abbattista signals a free kick to Udinese.
Eugenio Abbattista blows against Udinese's Samir for offside.
The second-half is over. The match ends 0-0.
Roberto De Zerbi is making the team's fourth substitution at Mapei Stadium with Pedro Obiang replacing Maxime Lopez.
